singleItemContent: 1. Are you interested in watching TV advertisements or internet advertisements?
2. What kinds of advertisements do you dislike?
3. Do you share advertiements with others?
4. Do you want to work in advertising in th future?
Describe a time you were very busy
And explain why you were busy
What are the advantages and disadvantages when people keep busy?
Do you think children should lern through playing games or under pressure?
What kind of pressure people may experience at work?
